夜に浮かぶ電照菊ハウス　愛知・田原

02 Nov 2019, 20:00



夜の田園地帯で光る電照菊のハウス（愛知県田原市で）＝佐藤俊和撮影

　菊の生産が盛んな渥美半島で、夜が更けると田園地帯いっぱいに電照菊の温室が輝き始める。
　愛知県は菊の出荷量が全国１位で、田原市はその９割を占める。農家は夜１０時過ぎから４、５時間、菊の苗を照らす。明るさを変化させて茎の成長や開花時期を調整しており、年間を通して出荷することができる。
　近年は白熱電球に替わって発光ダイオード（ＬＥＤ）照明が導入されている。寒くなると保温のために温室を遮光幕で覆うなどするため、この幻想的な光景を見られるのは今月半ばまでという。

Densho Kiku House floating in the night, Aichi and Tahara

02 Nov 2019, 20:00



House of electric chrysanthemum glowing in the countryside at night (in Tahara City, Aichi Prefecture) = Toshikazu Sato

In the Amami Peninsula, where chrysanthemum production is thriving, as the night goes on, the electric chrysanthemum greenhouse begins to shine through the countryside.
Aichi Prefecture has the largest shipment of chrysanthemums in the country, with Tahara City accounting for 90%. Farmers illuminate chrysanthemum seedlings for 4 to 5 hours after 10:00. It changes the brightness and adjusts the stem growth and flowering time, and can be shipped throughout the year.
In recent years, light-emitting diode (LED) illumination has been introduced in place of incandescent bulbs. It's only until mid-month that you can see this fantastic sight because the greenhouse is covered with a shading curtain to keep warm when it gets cold.
